original: @67b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @67b # // rgya gar skad du /

original: shr'i ao di yan t'a re kra m'a bhi sa ma ya n'a ma /
analyzed: shr'i ao di yan t'a re kra m'a bhi sa ma ya n'a ma /

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /

original: dpal au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: dpal au rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Stages of Realization of Glorious Uḍḍiyāna Tārā

original: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sdug bsngal srid pa'i mun pa ni //
analyzed: 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo // sdug bsngal srid pa'i mun pa ni //
translated: Homage to the noble Tārā!🔽The sun's rays that dispel

original: sel bar byed pa'i nyi 'od can //🔽thugs kar snying rjes brlan pa la //
analyzed: sel bar byed pa'i nyi 'od can // thugs kar snying rjes brlan pa la //
translated: the darkness of suffering and existence,🔽always I pay homage

original: rtag tu bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rtag tu bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: to the one whose heart is moistened with compassion.

original: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa'am rnal 'byor mas /
analyzed: dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pa'am rnal 'byor mas /

original: bsam gtan gyi khang pa yid dang mthun par 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi khang pa yid dang mthun par 'jam pa'i stan la 'dug nas /
translated: sits on a comfortable seat in a pleasing meditation hut

original: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la t'am yig dmar po las 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phros pas ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i 'khor khyab par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying gar aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la t'am yig dmar po las 'od zer gyi tshogs 'phros pas ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i 'khor khyab par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and visualizes at their heart a moon maṇḍala arisen from A, and on that a red TĀM, from which a mass of light rays emanates and pervades the entire sky.

original: de nas 'od zer gyi zhal mthong bar bya ba'i ma lus pa'i bla ma dang / yi dam gyi lha dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bltas te /
analyzed: de nas 'od zer gyi zhal mthong bar bya ba'i ma lus pa'i bla ma dang / yi dam gyi lha dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bltas te /
translated: Then, having seen the face of the light, one should look at all the gurus, meditation deities, and tathāgatas.

original: de rnams la sems kyis mchod pa byas la /
analyzed: de rnams la sems kyis mchod pa byas la /
translated: Having made offerings to them with the mind,

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod de /
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa brjod de /
translated: one should recite the refuge in the Three Jewels, and so on.

original: de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan par blta'o //
analyzed: de nas brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i bdag nyid dang ldan par blta'o //
translated: Then one should see all moving and unmoving beings as endowed with the nature of emptiness.

original: sngags brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags brjod par bya'o //

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /

original: de'i rjes su nam mkha' la padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las skyes pa'i khro bo'i rdo rjes bgegs bskrad do //
analyzed: de'i rjes su nam mkha' la padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i h'um yig las skyes pa'i khro bo'i rdo rjes bgegs bskrad do //
translated: After that, one should frighten away the obstructors with a wrathful vajra born from the syllable hūṃ on a lotus and sun in space.

original: rdo rje ra ba bsgom par gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang gi nang du /
analyzed: rdo rje ra ba bsgom par gnas pa'i chos 'byung gi dbus su gzhal yas khang gi nang du /
translated: In the center of the source of phenomena, which is imagined to be in the middle of a vajra fence, one should visualize the celestial mansion inside.

original: zla ba'i dbus su ham yig bltas te de nas ham yig las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro bar bya ste /
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su ham yig bltas te de nas ham yig las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro bar bya ste /
translated: Visualizing the syllable HAṂ in the middle of the moon, then one should emit all the Tathāgatas from the syllable HAṂ.

original: bdag nyid sgrol ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o /
analyzed: bdag nyid sgrol ma'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o /
translated: One should visualize oneself in the form of Tārā.

original: sku mdog dmar mo zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa gar byed pa /
analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo zhal bzhi pa phyag brgyad pa gar byed pa /
translated: She is red, with four faces, eight arms, and is dancing.

original: thod pa'i phreng ba can /
analyzed: thod pa'i phreng ba can /
translated: She has a garland of skulls.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: She is adorned with all the ornaments.

original: stag gi pags pas smad g-yogs pa //
analyzed: stag gi pags pas smad g-yogs pa //

original: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa /
translated: She is in the midst of a host of yoginīs.

original: spyan gsum ma /
analyzed: spyan gsum ma /

original: zhal khro gnyer can /
analyzed: zhal khro gnyer can /

original: de'i dang po'i zhal dmar po g-yas kyi gnag pa /
analyzed: de'i dang po'i zhal dmar po g-yas kyi gnag pa /
translated: Her first face is red, the right one is black,

original: g-yon pa'i ljang ba /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i ljang ba /

original: steng du zhi ba ser po'i g-yas pa'i phyag rnams na /
analyzed: steng du zhi ba ser po'i g-yas pa'i phyag rnams na /
translated: and the upper one is peaceful and yellow.

original: da ma ru dang / thod pa dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa /🔽g-yon pa na autpala dang / rin po che dang @68a * //
analyzed: da ma ru dang / thod pa dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa / g-yon pa na autpala dang / rin po che dang @68a * //
translated: In her right hands she holds a ḍamaru, a skull, a sword, and a vajra.🔽In her left hands she holds an utpala, a jewel,

original: dril bu dang / kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: dril bu dang / kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //

original: de nas tshogs padma lha mo brgyad /
analyzed: de nas tshogs padma lha mo brgyad /

analyzed: nye ba'i dur khrod gnyis so //

analyzed: mtshog kha / thugs ka / lte ba /
translated: The crown, the heart, the navel,

analyzed: gsang gnas / bral gnyis /

original: byin pa la rim pa bzhin du /
analyzed: byin pa la rim pa bzhin du /

analyzed: bhr'um bhr'um aa hrim kham zhes bya ba ni go cha'o //
translated: Bhruṃ bhruṃ hrīṃ kṣḥ. This is the armor.

original: de rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i dbus su h'um a'a: aom /
analyzed: de rdo rje padma 'khor lo'i dbus su h'um a'a: aom /
translated: In the middle of the vajra, lotus, and wheel, hūṃ āḥ oṃ.

original: de ltar ye shes /
analyzed: de ltar ye shes /

original: ye shes can gyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes can gyis bsgom par bya'o //

original: de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //

original: lha mo'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga /
analyzed: lha mo'i dbu la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga /
translated: On the head of the goddess, the five tathāgatas,

original: su ra ti shva ri la sogs pa la /
analyzed: su ra ti shva ri la sogs pa la /

original: dbu la rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: dbu la rin chen 'byung ldan no //

original: shi khi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la rnam par snang mdzad /
analyzed: shi khi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la rnam par snang mdzad /
translated: On Śikhi, and so on, on the head, Vairocana.

original: kam pu tsi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: kam pu tsi la sogs pa rnams la dbu la mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: On Kaṃpuca, and so on, on the head, Akṣobhya.

original: de nas aargham sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas aargham sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Then one should offer the argha.

original: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should partake of the nectar.

original: de la yam ram las dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi steng du padma'i snod bdud rtsi lngas bkang nas sha / go ha aa ma aom a'a: h'um des sbyin gyis brlab po //
analyzed: de la yam ram las dkyil 'khor gnyis kyi steng du padma'i snod bdud rtsi lngas bkang nas sha / go ha aa ma aom a'a: h'um des sbyin gyis brlab po //
translated: On the two maṇḍalas arisen from yaṃ and raṃ, in a lotus vessel filled with the five nectars, one should bless the nectar with śaṃ, go, ha, and oṃ āḥ hūṃ.

original: de nas sngags bzlas pa ni /
analyzed: de nas sngags bzlas pa ni /

original: yi ge bcu phat mthar sbyang sv'a h'a mthar spangs pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge bcu phat mthar sbyang sv'a h'a mthar spangs pa'o //
translated: The ten syllables with phaṭ at the end, abandoning svāhā at the end.

original: lha mo la bzlas pa byas pa thams cad la aom sngar ming gi yi ge mthar h'um phat sngags bzlas so //
analyzed: lha mo la bzlas pa byas pa thams cad la aom sngar ming gi yi ge mthar h'um phat sngags bzlas so //
translated: In the recitation of the goddess, all with oṃ at the beginning, the name syllable at the end, hūṃ phaṭ.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: dang ldan pa sgo'i lha mo rnams la'o //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: dang ldan pa sgo'i lha mo rnams la'o //
translated: For the door goddesses, with jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: bsgom pa las langs nas lha mo'i gzugs su 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa las langs nas lha mo'i gzugs su 'dzin par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having arisen from meditation, one should meditate on apprehending the form of the goddess.

original: ji ltar nus pas mchod pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar nus pas mchod pa'o //
translated: One should make offerings according to one's ability.

original: gtor ma sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: gtor ma sbyin pa'o //

original: de la gtor ma'i sngags 'di'o //
analyzed: de la gtor ma'i sngags 'di'o //
translated: The bali mantra for that is this:

original: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ akaro mukhaṃ sarvadharmāṇām adyanutpannatvāto oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: zhes bya ba rtag tu byas na grub pa thob po //
analyzed: zhes bya ba rtag tu byas na grub pa thob po //
translated: If one always does this, one will attain accomplishment.

original: de la the tshom ma byed cig / bcom ldan 'das ma au @69a * //
analyzed: de la the tshom ma byed cig / bcom ldan 'das ma au @69a * //

original: rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rgyan gyi sgrol ma'i mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa rdzogs so /
translated: The stage of realization of the Blessed Lady Tārā is complete.

original: // / thugs rje chen pos dbang lan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wi ni ta bha dra'i slob ma pandi ta sam gha shr'i bha dra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg ba'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o /
analyzed: // / thugs rje chen pos dbang lan gsum bskur ba'i grub thob wi ni ta bha dra'i slob ma pandi ta sam gha shr'i bha dra dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba 'jam dpal sgeg ba'i rdo rjes bsgyur ba'o /
translated: The paṇḍita Saṃghadeva, a disciple of the siddha Vinitabhadra, who was empowered three times by Avalokiteśvara, and the Tibetan translator Drokmi Lotsāwa Palgyi Yeshé translated this.
